text: Yiniharumathi jaham pani dhikkara ra apamana bhayo, allaha ra manisaharuka saranama ga'ekaharu baheka. Yiniharu allahako krodhako bhagi bha'isakeka chan. Ra daridratale gheri'eka chan. Yo yasakaranale ki yiniharule allahaka ayataharula'i inkara gardathe ra usaka dutaharula'i akarana maridinthe, yo badala ho yiniharuko avajnakarita ra atyacarako
